put.mlc.classifiers.common

Class MalletClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • put.mlc.classifiers.common.MalletClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler

    public class MalletClassifier
extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
    Implementation of a wrapper between Mallet classifiers and Weka classifier. This class extends AbstractClassifier, an abstract class from Weka and runs given in constructor Mallet trainer. After training it returns a Mallet classifier object.
    Author:
    Adrian Jaroszewicz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
